ShenandoahGC adaptations on JDK11 for RISC-V backend
A fix for interpreter frame verification code, skipping the locals check if there is no locals. See one of the additional commits in JDK-8286301, the RISC-V loom port.

Revert JDK-8220301: Remove jbyte use in CardTable

Note: An assertion in `CardTableBarrierSetAssembler::gen_write_ref_array_post_barrier` is removed. See the jdk11u backport for AArch64: https://mail.openjdk.org/pipermail/jdk-updates-dev/2019-August/001746.html
